attributes.action: Tell us how much money has been backhanded to politicians by our taxpayer funded bankers.
attributes.additional_details: There is so very much going wrong in our taxpayer funded banks with nothing being done by our politicians to improve the situation that, after all reasonable consideration of why this is happening, the only cogent conclusion can be that politicians are being paid to keep quiet and stay away.  The public needs to be told just how deeply each of our elected representatives is in hock to banks for cash bungs received by them from bankers.  TELL US NOW.
